import { Avatar, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import { AttachFile, InsertEmoticon, Mic, MoreVert, SearchOutlined, VideoCall} from '@material-ui/icons'; import React from 'react'; import "./chatstyle.css"; function Chat({messages}) { return (

Patient Name

Last seen at...

{messages.map((message) => (

{message.name} {message.message} {message.timestamp}

))}
) } export default Chat
